template.name: ethereal_per_role_template
template.summary: The per role template for the ethereal module.

desc.p: This template creates a derived domains which are used for ethereal packet capture tool.
This template is invoked automatically for each user, and generally does not need to be invoked directly by policy writers.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

param.name: user_domain
param.summary: The type of the user domain.

param.name: user_role
param.summary: The role associated with the user domain.

template.name: ethereal_admin_template
template.summary: The administrative functions template for the ethereal module.

desc.p: This template creates rules for administrating ethereal, allowing the specified user to manage ethereal files.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

param.name: user_domain
param.summary: The type of the user domain.

desc.p: This is a templated interface, and should only be called from a per-userdomain template.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

template.name: ethereal_domtrans_tethereal
template.summary: Run tethereal in the tethereal domain.

interface.name: ethereal_run_tethereal
interface.summary: Execute tethereal in the tethereal domain, and allow the specified role the tethereal domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the tethereal domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the tethereal domain to use.
